abstract: Champion Nascar driver Jeff Gordon announces that he will retire after 2015 season, partly due to chronic back injury.
lead_paragraph: Gordon, 43, who had 23 top-10 finishes in the Sprint Cup Series in 2014, said it was possible he would compete in select events after 2015, although he had no plans to do that.
snippet: Gordon, 43, who had 23 top-10 finishes in the Sprint Cup Series in 2014, said it was possible he would compete in select events after 2015, although he had no plans to do that.

keywords.value: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing

headline.main: 4-Time Champ Jeff Gordon Will Exit Cup Series After 2015
headline.print_headline: Gordon, Winner of 4 Cups, Will Exit Series After ’15
